articles.description: On its own, winning 0-3 at Livingston would not move the dial, but the manner of Saturday’s win surely did.  Joe Hart’s (correctly awarded) red card sent the flare up, Celtic would have to play on plastic for over an hour with 10 men.  This followed a tiring game in Rotterdam, where they finished with [...]

Swedish new Bhoys Gustaf Lagerbiekle and Odin Holm were dismissed in the 2-0 loss in the [...]
